name: Tales of Ostlea Easy-to-Click Nursery
description: If you've ever been frustrated by how hard it is to use the nursery how it's intended (by clicking and not using snaplinks), this should help. It's a very simple CSS edit that adds some padding and background color to every egg in the nursery, making it faster and easier to click through.
